solution_line_template: He drinks {bottles_per_month} bottles every month and there are {months_per_year} months in 1 year so that's {bottles_per_month}*{months_per_year} = <<{bottles_per_month}*{months_per_year}={total_bottles_per_year}>>{total_bottles_per_year} bottles

He earns ${refund_per_bottle} on every bottle that he recycles so that's {refund_per_bottle}*{total_bottles_per_year} = $<<{refund_per_bottle}*{total_bottles_per_year}={total_refund_amount}>>{total_refund_amount}

He has ${total_refund_amount} and each bottle costs ${cost_per_bottle} so he can buy {total_refund_amount}/{cost_per_bottle} = <<{total_refund_amount}/{cost_per_bottle}={bottles_can_buy}>>{bottles_can_buy} bottles
